arts.ttl: Atalanta stay top with record 10th straight win
arts.sum: Atalanta set a club record with their 10th consecutive Serie A win when they beat Cagliari 1-0 on Saturday and extended their advantage at the top of the standings thanks to Niccolo Zaniolo's goal and their keeper's heroics.

arts.ttl: Atalanta secure 10th consecutive victory, but Gasperini remains cautious
arts.sum: Atalanta continued their impressive run in Serie A with a narrow 1-0 victory over Cagliari, extending their winning streak to 10 matches. The post Atalanta secure 10th consecutive victory, but Gasperini remains cautious appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Gasperini's substitutions have immediate impact as Atalanta beats Cagliari to stay atop Serie A
arts.sum: Gasperini’s substitutions had an immediate impact as Atalanta won 1-0 at lowly Cagliari on Saturday to ensure it will end the weekend top of the Serie A table. Gasperini, who has been in charge of Atalanta for eight years, won the coach-of-the-year award in 2019 and 2020.
